Welcome to my space.

Xiaowei is a research in fluid mechanics, obtained my Ph.D. degreee from The University of Melbourne under the supervision of Prof. Richard Sanberg and Prof. Andrew Ooi at the Unimelb Fluid Mechanics Group.

I received a MPhil. in Bridge Engineering from Tongji University supervised by Prof. Yaojun Ge and Prof. Yongxin Yang in 2017. Before that, I completed a B.Sc in Civil Engineering from Hunan University under the supervision of Prof. Zhi Fang in 2013.

I am interested in turbulence modelling, machine learning, and structures such as bridges, wind turbines. I am fond of reading books about history, philosophy and films.

Feel free to contact me via: Github page, xiaowei.xu@unimelb.edu.au.
